SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
INSERT INTO t_doantor(donorId, name, sex, age, abo, certificateId, certificateType, mobileTelePhone, donationTotalVolumes, lastDonationDate, telePhone, rh, createTime, updateTime, city, address) VALUES (#{donorId}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{abo}, #{certificateId}, #{certificateType}, #{mobileTelePhone}, #{donationTotalVolumes}, #{lastDonationDate}, #{telePhone}, #{rh}, NOW(), NOW(), #{city}, #{address})
